message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. I understand its worth to you stands at $1000000. Considering the product's unique features and market positioning, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss how this product can significantly benefit your endeavors. Kind regards, Alice
